Magic Notes:
Harmful Font: +4 D6 slots
Warpriest: Spell Expert (Divine)
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each day
Deity: Has access to Magic Missile, Magic Mouth, Levitate, Blink, Prying Eye, Wall Of Force, Warp Mind, Maze, Destruction spells
Divine Spellcasting: May learn spells from the divine tradition
Divine Weapon: (F) May cast a spell that also causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP force or +1d6 HP alignment for the remainder of turn
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Sap Life: Casting Harm on another creature restores Hit Points to self equal to the spell level
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
